it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class LensCutterBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.LensCutterBehaviour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToolCardBehaviour

    public class LensCutterBehaviour
extends java.lang.Object
implements ToolCardBehaviour
    The class to describe the behaviour of the Lens Cutter ToolCard ToolCard. (Tool Card 5)

    The ToolCard allows to change a die from the DraftPool with a die from the RoundTrack

    • Method Detail

      • areRequirementsSatisfied

        public boolean areRequirementsSatisfied(Game game)
        Tells if the tool card can be applied.

        This tool card can only be applied if the player hasn't placed a die yet.

        Specified by:
        areRequirementsSatisfied in interface ToolCardBehaviour
        Parameters:
        game - The game the tool card will be applied to.
        Returns:
        true if the player hasn't already placed a die; false otherwise.

      • askParameters

        public void askParameters(ViewMessage message)
        Selects the correct view to gather the parameters the tool card needs to be used.
        Specified by:
        askParameters in interface ToolCardBehaviour
        Parameters:
        message - The message sent by the view.

      • useToolCard

        public boolean useToolCard(Game game,
                           ViewMessage message)
        The action associated to the Lens Cutter ToolCard.

        The chosen die of the DraftPool is swapped with the chosen die of the RoundTrack (the information for the index and the Coordinates is in the message). It's set the forced selection of the drafted die for the next placement in the Pattern.

        Specified by:
        useToolCard in interface ToolCardBehaviour
        Parameters:
        game - the game the effect has to be applied to.
        message - the message sent by the view.
        Returns:
        true if the tool card has been successfully applied; false otherwise.
